𓊃 𓈙 𓂋 𓌕||arrow|𐭲𐭢𐭫 tigr OLD Persian READING 𓊃 as DG/DG/Tj see greed etc > তীর tīr = 𓌕 ⋍ 𓄝

𓌕 = 𒋾 TI 𒈧 تیر তীর tīr ⋍ 𓄝 ⋍ 𓄜 ⋍ Tier < Tiger ⋍ 𐭲𐭢𐭫 tigr = 𓌕

तीर tīr тир Türken ⋍= Kasachen ⋍ qarsoq = sagetar ☑

The Arrow was invented maybe 20000 BC, of historic importance as it helped mankind decimating the remaining megafauna, Populating the earth and forced to adopt new ways of hunting and living.

𒊓𒋛𒉡 sa-si-nu Schiessnik 𓊃𓈙𓂋𓌕𓀁
𒊓𒋛𒉡 bowyer, arcuarius arch-maker

𓌕 ⋍ 𓊃 𓈙 𓂋 𓌕 ⇔ 𒍣𒁍 se-sir sthrow

medical doctor — physician π.sick π.sit

𓅨 𓂋 𓌕 𓏌 𓅱 𓏪 𓀀 | master physician | 𓌕 𓏌 𓏤 𓀀 | physician, doctor | ܐܵܣܝܼܬ݂ܵܐ āsīṯā ܐܵܣܝܵܐ āsyā 医者 いさ isa <> asian assistant 𓊨 𓀻 <> Beisetzer 𓌕 ≈ 𓌢 sister (Kranken)Schwester <> دكتور doktōr دُخْتَر doxtar "girl" <> kuracisto cure 𓌕 ≈ 𓌢 #zjnw ≈ #śn ⲥⲛⲁⲩ syn 𓌕 ≈ 𓌢 ሐኪም ḥäkim "medic" 𓌕 ≈ 𒋾 TI 𒈧 ti.ba? ≈ طَبِيبة ṭabība ? <> top (good) 𓌕 𓏌 𓏲 "doctor" 𓌕 ≈ 𓋹 life, ache in 𓅃𓉻 ≈ 𓅃𓋹 ἰατρός iatrós <> psychiatry? 𐌻𐌴𐌺𐌴𐌹𐍃 lēkeis læge lékař ле̄ккар lēkkar lääkäri ( Leger , Leecher )

𓆄𓆄 𓏏 𓏤 ≈ 𓋬 𓁦 maat measure : *medēōr, from Proto-Indo-European *med- (“to measure, give advice, heal”). Compare Avestan 𐬬𐬍-𐬨𐬀𐬛‎ (vī-mad), Old Persian [script needed] (azdā), Old Armenian միտ (mit), Old Irish midiur, Gothic 𐌼𐌹𐍄𐌰𐌸𐍃 (mitaþs), Ancient Greek μέδομαι (médomai), German Maut.
